issue.title: [CF 1203] Make bars show party-members target hp and name.
issue.body:
I feel like that can be done somehow. Make bar emulate party-members target unit frame. Coz there is pretty much nothing among addons to show party targets with default raid-style party frames.


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad | Imported from CurseForge issue #1203 | Raw

comments.body:
Sure. Make a Resource Display icon, set the resource type to health, and set the units to watch to "party1-4target".


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Awesome. Work pretty good. Im also wonder is there is a way to make bar color the same as target class color. I see there is custom texture option, Maybe there is a way to use texture with condition. I probably just can create the icon for every class with [class object=%] conditions, but that's alot of groups, maybe there is easier way, shortcut. Also thank you very much for answering all my questions, I really appreciate it!


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad

Added class coloring to bars in the next Legion build


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
